CustomField.description: This check box will automatically get checked upon creating a work shift that is not in the past. Upon unchecking this check box, the user will no longer show up on the Work Shift Calendar. Conversely, if a work shift goes into the past, then the “Currently Working” check box will become unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox will get auto-checked upon creating a work shift that is not in the past. Upon unchecking, the user will no longer show up on the Work Shift Calendar. If a work shift is in the past, then Currently Working will become unchecked.
CustomField.label: Currently Working
